sub_title: Finance Analytics Manager at Kraft Heinz  | IESE Executive MBA Candidate | Conference Speaker | AI in Finance
summary:
Finance Analytics and Automation Manager with 7+ years of experience in Financial planning and analysis (FP&A), Management Accounting, Controllership and Supply Chain Finance within Australia, Mexico and The Netherlands.

IESE Executive MBA Candidate 2023 - 2025

Conference Speaker in Topics such as: Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Finance, Finance Transformation, Data Analytics in FP&A and Finance, Practical Applications of Data Science, and more!

Prior experience in Operations (Logistics & Trade), Sales with a Master's Degree in Finance and Lean Six Sigma Green Belt.

Strong background in financial modelling and data analytics using Python, Tableau, Alteryx, Power BI, SQL, Excel, Azure Machine Learning and R.

Stakeholder focused finance business partner, who is always looking to optimize processes using data analytics and augmented intelligence.

Named 30 under 30 in the Accounting and Finance industry in Australia in 2021; Won International Rising Star in Finance 2023, Won EMEA Data Democratizer Award in 2022, Finalist in the Young Leaders in Finance Awards 2018 ; excellent communication and interpersonal skills built by studying and working in 6 countries; proficient in four languages.

A bit more about me:

‚úÖ Launched The Financial Fox , a project to democratize machine learning and data analytics.

‚úÖ Organized workshops and networking events for Finance Professionals in Australia and The Netherlands around data analytics, finance and machine learning.

‚úÖ Speaker, about Finance Analytics and Career Mentor

‚úÖ Marathon Finisher and World traveller (have been in 70+ countries and always planning next adventure!)

Skilled in management accounting, financial planning & analysis, financial modeling and business analytics, business partnering, data analysis, predictive analysis, quantitative research, data visualization, communication skills, reporting, finance automation, ability to simplify complexity.

üåê Schedule time with me for Career Mentoring or Data Analytics Coaching: https://calendly.com/christianantonio-martinez

üåê Read my Medium Blog: https://christianmartinezfinancialfox.medium.com/

üåê All my links: https://linktr.ee/Thefinancialfox

The program is designed to enhance the competitive profile of people pursuing careers in investment banking, private equity, equity research, business development and corporate finance

Basically I am working to develop a 3-statement model completely from scratch, inputting historical data and assumptions to project out financial statements.

I am also calculating weighted average cost of capital (WACC) in a real world company, implementing commonly used approaches to calculating terminal value, and all the nuances of DCF modelling.

Working towards representing finance issues in modeling form, such as through the Sortino Ratio or similar models and breaking down complex financial issues into simpler components to better understand how they interrelate.

Complete list of courses:
-Financial Statements
-Discounted cash flow (DCF) modelling
-Leveraged buyout (LBO) modelling
-Accretion / dilution (M&A) modelling
-Excel mechanics and functionality
